Comments_List: I was provided with a comprehensive overview of major works from the Italian Renaissance, which equipped me with a deepened understanding of how the social, political, and economic organizations and events of the period emerged and progressed.
I learned about a very specific moment in Italian history and furthered my education in art history and Renaissance studies. My skills in literary analysis improved through class discussions as well.
I was quite satisfied with the course.

The course was very well organized. Each reading was discussed in class and many discussions were accompanied by photographs of certain artwork we were discussing. This helped create a more interesting discussion.
Absolutely. This is required course for anyone who wants to know anything about the Italian Renaissance.
I would recommend this course to those who study the Renaissance, but also to those who have a passing interest in this period and in art history.
Yes, I would definitely recommend it.
